channel.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
channel.description:
[size=6pt]Please, don't take the slogan to seriously[/size] [center][size=36pt][b]We will start developing as soon as possible![/b][/size] [img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/Odinlogo.png[/img] [iurl=#introduction]1.0 Introduction[/iurl] [iurl=#donation]2.0 How we will work togethor[/iurl] [iurl=#applying]3.0 The Applying Layout[/iurl] [iurl=#media]4.0 Media[/iurl] [iurl=#staff]5.0 Staff list[/iurl] [iurl=#credit]6.0 Credits[/iurl]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] This source is not a remake, it is an attempt to make a better server for other people to play. I intend this server to be developed at the maximum level, and a group of programmers is better then none. This is a 474 server, similar to a PI(not loading 500+ though). I picked this revision so that we had a little more room to work with(rather then a 317 or a Deltascape server) while still maintaining the old-style graphics.[/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center]
[size=2][b][anchor=donation]2.0 - How we will work togethor [/b][/size] We will mostly be using Skype. To share files, it will be discussed one we have got a good team going.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=applying]3.0 - The Applying Layout[/b][/size]
Here is the layout:
[code] E-mail address?:* What position do you want? (Server Developer, Client Developer, Tester, Artist,):* How long have you been practicing this position?:* What time zone are you in?:* Why do you want to become part of this server?:*
(Server Developer other required information) What are you mainly aiming at developing(Content, Stabilizing, etc.):
(Optional information) In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: How long will you be on everyday?: [/code]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=media]5.0 - Media[/b][/size] [img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/Crafting.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HG8OWlKfZHA&feature=plcp[/youtube] [img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w444/OdinSource/Telegrabs.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56QK8cQ_3S0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size] [b]Developers[/b] [i]runescape sucks[/i]
[size=2][b][anchor=credit]7.0 - Credits[/b][/size]
[b]arham 4:[/b] Format for this topic
Any questions? Suggestions? Concerns? Something I missed? Post them below, and I will answer them to best of my knowledge.

item.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Why not release any GP at all? And let players get it on their own.

But even still, if I do put trading sticks as the currency, it could be like different valued coins (Ex. 1000 sticks = 1 coin, 1000 coins = 1 tokkul) That of course would probably not be used, but it’s worth a shot.

Read full topic
item.source: Odin - Making a better future, in the future

item.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:3, topic:451913”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=554796.msg4063108#msg4063108 date=1343605438]
What exactly is going to be the difference between this and other projects? List some of your ideas or plans or something.
[/quote]
Well, I am trying to make a server, that contains loads of content, content that you could play for months. I am hoping to come up with new unique ideas for skills in ways to train them, I already have a few, but I haven’t implemented them at all yet.[/quote]
That’s exactly what I want! I have many ideas and extreme amount of content I want to add, but can’t because of my lack of java knowledge :o Hopefully I will see what you can implement

Read full topic
item.source: Odin - Making a better future, in the future

item.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Again, thank you all for the support.

Question: How would you feel if coins weren’t the main currency?
Because I was thinking about it, and gold coins seem like it would be a hard thing to come by. So I was thinking of making it sort of rare(Not like partyhats of course), and using something like trading sticks, since they look like they’re made of wood, it would make more sense that in this time, they’d be the main currency.

Read full topic
item.source: Odin - Making a better future, in the future

item.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:6, topic:451913”]E-mail address?:* Nicky_snowboardingmaster@hotmail.com
What position do you want? (Server Developer, Client Developer, Tester, Artist,):* Server Dev.
How long have you been practicing this position?:* ~2 Years.
What time zone are you in?:* -5 EST
Why do you want to become part of this server?:* I love to program, I love the older revisions of RuneScape, and I like to learn.

(Server Developer other required information)
What are you mainly aiming at developing(Content, Stabilizing, etc.): I prefer content, but I wouldn’t mind programming the core.

(Optional information)
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: XxxTilllyxxX / Cactus
How old are you?: 16 in a month.
How long will you be on everyday?: ~6 hours.[/quote]
Alright, I’ll PM you a simple test.

Read full topic

item.title: Odin - Making a better future, in the future
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Team_Rocket:

What exactly is going to be the difference between this and other projects? List some of your ideas or plans or something.

Well, I am trying to make a server, that contains loads of content, content that you could play for months. I am hoping to come up with new unique ideas for skills in ways to train them, I already have a few, but I haven’t implemented them at all yet.

I guess the difference between this and other projects, well it’s not going to be a remake, completely. It will contain alot of Runescape’s content, but it won’t be exactly like Runescape either.

Read full topic
item.source: Odin - Making a better future, in the future

item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[size=6pt]Please, don’t take the slogan to seriously[/size]
[center][size=36pt]We will start developing as soon as possible![/size]

[iurl=#introduction]1.0 Introduction[/iurl]
[iurl=#donation]2.0 How we will work togethor[/iurl]

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
This source is not a remake, it is an attempt to make a better server for other people to play. I intend this server to be developed at the maximum level, and a group of programmers is better then none. This is a 474 server, similar to a PI(not loading 500+ though). I picked this revision so that we had a little more room to work with(rather then a 317 or a Deltascape server) while still maintaining the old-style graphics.[/center]
[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]

[size=2][anchor=donation]2.0 - How we will work togethor [/size]
We will mostly be using Skype. To share files, it will be discussed one we have got a good team going.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=applying]3.0 - The Applying Layout[/size]

Here is the layout:

E-mail address?:*
What position do you want? (Server Developer, Client Developer, Tester, Artist,):*
How long have you been practicing this position?:*
What time zone are you in?:*
Why do you want to become part of this server?:*

(Server Developer other required information)
What are you mainly aiming at developing(Content, Stabilizing, etc.):

(Optional information)
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:
How old are you?:
How long will you be on everyday?:
